Pill input

Use the pill input component to add one or more tags to an input field. These tags can be used to filter the page content, for example.

Installation 

                  
                    npm i @govflanders/vl-ui-pill-input

or 

                  
                    yarn add @govflanders/vl-ui-pill-input

Usage

Import SASS 

                  
                  @import "vl-ui-pill-input/src/scss/pill-input";

Make sure your sass --include-path includes node_modules/@govflanders/.

Import JS

                  
                  import { Pillinput } from '@govflanders/vl-ui-pill-input';

Pill input

Add multiple tags to the input field. Submit a tag by pushing the enter key.

      <label class="vl-form__label" for="pill-input-1">Categorieën</label>
  <div class="vl-pill-input__wrapper">
    <input class="vl-input-field"
      type="text"
      id="pill-input-1"
      name="pill-input-1"
      value=""
      data-vl-pill-input
      data-vl-pill-input-unique="true" />
  </div>

Pill input with email validation

Add multiple email addresses to the input field. Only correctly formatted email addresses will be accepted (eg. john@doe.be).

      <label class="vl-form__label" for="pill-input-2">E-mailadres contactpersonen</label>
  <div class="vl-pill-input__wrapper">
    <input class="vl-input-field"
      type="text"
      id="pill-input-2"
      name="pill-input-2"
      value=""
      data-vl-pill-input
      data-vl-pill-input-unique="true"data-vl-pill-input-email="true" />
  </div>
